usage: A przechadzając się nad Morzem Galilejskim, zobaczył Szymona i Andrzeja, jego brata , zarzucających sieć w morze; byli bowiem rybakami. As Jesus was strolling beside the Sea of Galilee, he saw Simon and Andrew, his brother , casting a net into the sea; they were fishermen
Usage notes [ edit ] The word chłopiec is usually used for people younger than chłopak .
Usage notes [ edit ] The sense of "male human being" carries connotations of bravery honour or responsibility ; in other words, the stereotypical quality of " manliness ".
Coordinate term: stryj

usage: Usage notes [ edit ] The plural of this masculine form is also used to refer to couples.
Usage notes [ edit ] The plural of this word refers to multiple female fiancées. The plural of the masculine form is used to refer to couples.

usage: Usage notes [ edit ] Not used for casual relationships; znajomy or kolega is preferable for that.

usage: Moim dwóm największym kochaniom , temu dużemu i temu małemu. To my two most darling dear s, the big one and the little one.
Od tego kochania całkiem już straciła głowę. ― She almost went crazy from all this loving .

derivedTerms: kto ma księdza w rodzie, tego bieda nie ubodzie
usage: Nasza szefowa, pani Magdalena, na zarzut księdza , że jej nieskromny dekolt wzbudza grzeszne myśli odpowiedziała, że on nie skusiłby jej, nawet gdyby stanął przed nią nago. Our boss, Ms. Magdalena, to the priest's objection that her immodest décolletage evokes sinful thoughts replied that he would not tempt her even if he stood naked in front of her.
